meanings.definition: A pad placed underneath a mattress or chair cushion to protect against leaks or spills.
meanings.sent1: I put an underpad under the mattress to keep it clean.
meanings.sent2: The underpad absorbed the spilled drink quickly.
meanings.sent3: The underpad saved the day when the water glass tipped over.
meanings.sent4: Her underpad was like a shield against any accidents.
meanings.sent5: The underpad was a lifesaver during the party with messy kids around.

meanings.definition: A disposable absorbent pad used for incontinence protection.
meanings.sent1: Grandma uses an underpad for protection at night.
meanings.sent2: The underpad kept the bed dry throughout the night.
meanings.sent3: The underpad made Grandma giggle with its reliability.
meanings.sent4: The underpad was a silent guardian against leaks.
meanings.sent5: The underpad was like a secret superhero under the sheets.

meanings.definition: To place a pad underneath something for protection or support.
meanings.sent1: I will underpad the chair to prevent scratches on the floor.
meanings.sent2: She underpads fragile items before packing them.
meanings.sent3: He underpads everything like a pro to avoid damage.
meanings.sent4: Underpadding the table with a cloth made it stable.
meanings.sent5: The artist underpads the canvas before starting to paint.
